comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Seems like a good deal for that car.¬† Hard to beat a Bentley in Vegas...¬† What's the mileage of the vehicle?¬† I didn't see it listed anywhere.¬† I also see that it's in "near perfect condition" which has me wondering what isn't in perfect condition about it.¬† Still, regardless of the slight defects or possibly high mileage, this is still a great deal for a Bentley.¬† For $75,000 I could see a collector picking this up just to sit in their garage and look pretty.¬† Any insight on why you are selling the vehicle?¬† Just to move the funds into a better investment or did you replace this with something even more eye catching?
